select user_id, user_name, mobile, email, sex, age, status, create_time, update_time from sys_user where 1 = 1
and user_name like concat('%',#{sysUser.userName},'%')
and status = #{sysUser.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{sysUser.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{sysUser.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and user_id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id = 1)
and user_id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id = 2)
order by create_time
